title: Kobuleti Museum
about: Kobuleti Museum is located at 100 Davit Agmashenebeli Avenue, Kobuleti, Adjara. The museum has a rich collection, here is the material found in the territory of Kobuleti municipality, which covers all stages of human development, from the Stone Age to the Middle Ages. Here you will find tools, pottery, coins, ancient manuscripts, works of art from different periods, ethnographic material, photographs and other interesting artefacts. Kobuleti Museum is one of the wonderful places to get acquainted with the history and ancient culture of Georgia and this region. The exhibits in the museum make an indelible impression on anyone interested in any culture.
